mapper.sql: a.t_batch_perslUploadId, a.t_batch_perslUploadStatus_id, a.t_batch_perslUploadStatus_batchid, a.t_batch_perslUploadPer_num, a.t_batch_perslUploadEffectStatus, a.t_batch_perslUploadClearStatus, a.t_batch_company, a.t_batch_vendorCompany, a.t_batch_persProdName, a.t_batch_payroll_tot, a.t_batch_payrollCredit_tot, a.t_batch_remark, a.t_batch_clearInfo, a.t_batch_category, a.t_batch_comment, a.t_batch_progress, a.t_batch_EffectStartDate, a.t_batch_EffectEndDate, a.modify_time, a.modifier, a.create_time, a.creator
mapper.select:
select
from t_batch_personupload_status a where a.t_batch_perslUploadStatus_batchid = #{t_batch_perslUploadId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_batch_personupload_status a where 1=1
and a.t_batch_perslUploadStatus_batchid like CONCAT('%',#{t_batch_perslUploadStatus_batchid},'%')
and a.t_batch_perslUploadEffectStatus like CONCAT('%',#{t_batch_perslUploadEffectStatus},'%')
and a.t_batch_vendorCompany like CONCAT('%',#{t_batch_vendorCompany},'%') and a.t_batch_company like CONCAT('%',#{t_batch_company},'%')
and a.t_batch_vendorCompany = CONCAT('%',#{t_batch_vendorCompany},'%')
and a.t_batch_company like CONCAT('%',#{t_batch_company},'%')
and a.t_batch_company = CONCAT('%',#{t_batch_company},'%')
and a.t_batch_persProdName like CONCAT('%',#{t_batch_persProdName},'%')
and a.t_batch_remark like CONCAT('%',#{t_batch_remark},'%')
order by a.create_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_batch_personupload_status (SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),"-",""), #{batch_PB_batchID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batch_PB_batchID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count(batch_PB_PID), "关闭状态", "未结算", batch_PB_company, batch_PB_vendorcompany, batch_PB_ProdName, SUM(batch_PB_credit), SUM(batch_PB_credit), "", #{payrollDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobcat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "新上传", "0.00", #{t_batch_EffectStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{t_batch_EffectEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOW(), "system", NOW(), #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM t_batch_personupload a WHERE a.batch_PB_batchID = #{batch_PB_batchID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.batch_PB_batchID)
mapper.update:
update t_batch_personupload_status
t_batch_perslUploadId = #{t_batch_perslUploadId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_perslUploadStatus_id = #{t_batch_perslUploadStatus_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_perslUploadStatus_batchid = #{t_batch_perslUploadStatus_batchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_perslUploadPer_num = #{t_batch_perslUploadPer_num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_batch_perslUploadEffectStatus = #{t_batch_perslUploadEffectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_perslUploadClearStatus = #{t_batch_perslUploadClearStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_company = #{t_batch_company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_vendorCompany = #{t_batch_vendorCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_persProdName = #{t_batch_persProdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_payroll_tot = #{t_batch_payroll_tot,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t_batch_payrollCredit_tot = #{t_batch_payrollCredit_tot,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t_batch_remark = #{t_batch_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_clearInfo = #{t_batch_clearInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_category = #{t_batch_category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_comment = #{t_batch_comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_progress = #{t_batch_progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_batch_EffectStartDate = #{t_batch_EffectStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
t_batch_EffectEndDate = #{t_batch_EffectEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where t_batch_perslUploadId = #{t_batch_perslUploadId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from t_batch_personupload_status a where a.t_batch_perslUploadClearStatus = "未结算"
and a.t_batch_company != #{t_batch_company}
